alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 02 at 7:22AM PST until December 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. North winds 10 to 15 mph will lead to wind chills 10 to 20 below zero with readings of negative 30 localized to around Moses Lake. * WHERE...Mansfield, Oroville, Bridgeport, Waterville, Brewster, Quincy, Moses Lake, Nespelem, Okanogan, Othello, Omak, Badger Mountain Road, Disautel Pass, and Ephrata. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, several layers, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau
